name: df-clintop
body: |- wceq(cclintop, cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), cintop, cv(s0))))
comment: Function mapping a set to the class of all closed (internal binary) operations for this set, see definition in section 1.2 of [Hall] p. 2, definition in section I.1 of [Bruck] p. 1, or definition 1 in [BourbakiAlg1] p. 1, where it is called "a law of composition". (Contributed by AV, 20-Jan-2020.)
